review_blob: skunky, golden, sparkling, hazy, minimal head, umami, lightly bitter, salty, light body, thin feel, lively, astringent. I cant understant such low ratings on this beer. Its descent when it comes to taste, but its skunky aroma is definately what I like about heineken and will give it a 10 on aroma until I can find a beer that has an aroma that smells more like the real thing than this. Im sure it can be done. Hemp beer maybe. lol

light body, oily feel, average carbonation, medium bitterness, umami, brown, sparkling, clear, minimal head,banana, caramel

I would say its pretty good in the bottle. In my opinion I think it seems kind of watered down which may mask alot of the potential flavors that this beer may have. I  reallyhave a hard time believing that this beer won those medals, but I havent tried it on tap so I may eat my words some day. Coming from the bottle its worth a try, but its nothing too spectacular or memorable in my opinion.
